ygData.subject: RE: Norrathian Lore: Nagafen's Lair (was: Archmage Answers)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dangit, those aren t gnolls!  hehe. Kobolds, goblins, and (if I may be so bold) that big ass dog I think is Nagafen. Fire Giants hate Goblins, vice versa.
ygData.messageBody:
> Yeah, I want to know the meaning behind the "Gnolls playing poker" Painting

Dangit, those aren't gnolls! hehe.

Kobolds, goblins, and (if I may be so bold) that big ass dog I think
is Nagafen.

Fire Giants hate Goblins, vice versa.
Nagafen likes Fire Giants, vice versa.

therefore Goblins hate Nagafen, vice versa.

Gnomes hate Kobolds, vice versa.

Do gnomes hate goblins? If so, why are they living in Solusek.
Why would the goblins even let them?

Did the Kobolds capture and lock up Nagafen? Or are the kobolds
protecting Nagafen? The fire giants protect Nagafen, but the
goblins don't like the fire giants, why?

The kobolds have a goblin (guano harvester) that seems to be their
slave. I mean who would walk about and collect bat poop in a bag
on their own?

Do the kobolds dislike the goblins?

All this is painted on the walls of SolusekB, all these races
are repsented on the walls. To answer your question here as
well Kit. There are wall/cave paintings all over inside Solb,
they depict a story, I want to know the story.

Harmonic.
